TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ExtenderControlToolboxItem extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem

Docs.summary: Provides a way to determine which target controls can be extended by a particular extender control in the toolbox.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlToolboxItem.GetTargetControlTypes%2A> method returns the collection of target types. The collection is cached for performance by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Properties%2A> dictionary.
If you write an extender control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>, but that does not derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>, specify this type in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemAttribute> attribute of your control.

Docs.returns: A read-only collection of the target types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The collection is cached for performance by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Properties%2A> dictionary.
